title: ALTERED CARBON Season 2 Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Any ya'll wanna join me in Striking Vipers? 🐍🐍😂
I prefer season 1 I liked the stuff with Jaegar but the cyber punk noir detective feel of the first season was the best for me
I’m guessing their was budget cuts for season 2 . Season 1 just had so much detail and world building and gave a blade runner feel.
It started out slow, but man, by episode 5 I was back in love with the series. Having to get use to a new protagonist is really hard but I got there and loved the final episodes fully invested again.
I just noticed that the Protectorate helmets look just like the head and eyes of the Elder...
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and explain the ending to Netflix's sci-fi action drama Altered Carbon reviewing season 2 and what it could mean for season 3.
